DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate non-inferiority clinical efficacy two different drug treatment patient diagnose moderate severe back pain treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Of Ketorolac Tromethamine Oral Drops Versus Naproxen For Moderate Severe Back Pain Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: - double-blind , double-dummy , non-inferiority , prospective , parallel group , intent treat trial . - Experiment duration : 04 day . - 03 visit ( day 0 , 2 4 ) . - Efficacy evaluate back pain relief base visual analogic scale . - Adverse event evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Consent patient legal guardian . Men woman age 18 65 . Diagnosis acute low back pain moderate severe pain ( Visual Analogic score great 4 cm ) fracture confirm Xray Diagnosis infection , fever , Pregnancy , lactation ; Diagnosis fibromyalgia ; Hypersensitivity ketorolac tromethamine , ingredient formula Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory
